content: आल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आ-अल्-पर्याप्तौ अच्] Large, extensive. --लः, --लं {@--1@} Spawn, any discharge of venomous matter from poisonous animals; °अक्त anointed with poison as an arrow. {@--2@} Trick, fraud; येषां श्रुतमालजालाय <ls>K. 288</ls>; °जालानि चिंतयंती <ls n="K.">310.</ls> {@--3@} Yellow arsenic, orpiment.
